attributes.action: Rescind Article 50 until Dexeu come up with a credible plan
attributes.background: We seem unprepared for Brexit.  The government need to rescind Article 50 until Dexeu have come up with a credible plan to leave.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we are not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

Rescinding Article 50 would be a permanent step, not a temporary pause. We aren't sure whether this is what you wanted.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235753
